posts.title: Is there a distinct way to know for certain? (New York) - missed connections
posts.body: Just directly ask them. There's no other distinct way, than clear communication.You wrote:If a person has feelings for you? Say you have known them a year or more.Just for instance.

posts.title: Battery Plus - missed connections
posts.body: To the stunning at lady at Battery Plus in Apex getting a new watch batteryJust wanted to say WOW you look great in the blue topHave a GREAT SUMMER
